page.title: 11SENIORCITIZENS APPLETONWISKE
page.content: There is a coach outing in the Summer. At Christmas they have dinner and a concert in the School and are given a food hamper from the customers of the LORD NELSON. Everyone in the bungalows says that they think that they are very well looked after and that the bungalows are warm and comfortable in the winter.They also think this is a very friendly village to live in.One lady said of all the places she had lived this was the friendlyist most of there families live nearby.Most have lived in Appleton a long time.Most do there shopping at the village shop a few shop at Northallerton and some at Yarm and Midlesbrough.
